resources.string:
Smart School Manager contains four major components which are:
 
1. Library Section: Which contains list of books to study 
2. Take Quiz: Contains series of questions to test your knowledge 
3. My History: Contains all time history of various quizzes taken 
4. Results: Result of Current Quiz.
Welcome to Smart School Manager your preferred management software that allows you to digitally monitor your learning along with managing your progress and performance on a single platform.
Developed by Team Mobile-Edu-02. \n\tGADS 2020 Community Project.
